121.content:
Remy was in his personalized kitchen trying new delicacies, when he heard his brothers voice call his name. looking around he eventually spotted him and went over to him. "what's up Emile?" Remy asked.

Emile looked down at the ground for a minute and then looked up and asked somewhat shyly, yet eagerly, "could I possibly be your Taste-tester?"

Remy smiled and laughed. he then responded, "Emile, you know my food always tastes good! Why would I need a taste-tester?"

Emile's ears drooped and he responded quietly, "w-well... never mind." and began to walk off.

Remy saw the look his brother had and quickly grabbed him by the shoulders, though gently. he then said, "well if you want to be my sampler, then why not. I know my food is good. but maybe you can help pin-point which spices work best!" he then thought to himself If he wanted to get extra food I coulda just made him some, but at least he wants to be helpful.

"well... what should I sample first?" Emile asked excitedly

Remy thought for a second and then said...
121.title: Taste-Tester Emile

1213.content: What other kinds of food could Remy let Emile taste?

122.content:
It was another day in Paris as Remmy was enjoying his day off of cooking at Le Ratatouille. Whenever he got a day off he'd do what he loved to do best, cook, but not just cooking, but experimenting. He always loved to find new recipes. The new flavors that made people go nuts over his food. In a few short months he created some of the most unique dishes Paris had ever seen and though, nobody knew who they were created by, Remmy felt satisfaction from simply hearing them order another plate. Truely, he could create more and more delicious flavors each day, but he never guessed he'd one day create the most delicious flavor in the universe.
"I'll add a dash of this, and a pinch of that and for the heck of it, I'll add these two." Remmy thought to himself as he worked in his private kitchen. He stirred the ingredients in a bowl, poured it in a pan and then placed it in a mini over that was built just for him.
He waited a half an hour for it to finish and took it out of the over. He took a whiff of the miniture cake he made and almost dropped it after the aroma entered his senses. It was so heavenly he didn't think a smell could smell so good. It was almost undescribable, with the exception of the word, perfect. He set it down and took another taste. Perfect.
As if the forbidden cake of the devil, Remmy knew he had created the greatest thing in the universe and he didn't need a second opinion to know. He began imagining everyone eating the cake and never wanting anything else. But suddenly the image was blocked out and only thoughts of the cake swam in his mind. He shrugged, trying not to think of the cake, but it seemed to inhabit every thought in his mind. He decided he was just a little hungry since he usually missed lunch while he experimented and decided to finish the cake.
Normally, he liked to savor his food, to feel the flavors, but suddenly he munched it down greedily, almost like he had no control over himself, but nonetheless, the flavor was so strong it stuck to his tongue and almsot brought him to tears with happiness. He shuddered to think what would happen if his brother Emile got a hold of it. He liked to eat all the time anyway. He wouldn't stop eating this cake if he caught so much as a whiff of it. Remmy began thinking that the cake might be too perfect. He worried it could be very bad if people couldn't resist it. He had used a lot of fattening items in it and he only used a tiny pan. What would happen if he made one full scale?
Remmy thought it might be best to keep this to himself for the time being. It was then he...
122.title: The Greatest Flavor in the Universe

choices: He had eaten in his sleep
Emile had helped himself to a few cakes
1221.content:
Remy, intoxicated with the scent, decided that, just to be sure, he should test another one. They were surprisingly easy to make, and took little time to cook, and, as soon as the second incarnation of Remy's cake came, it was immediately devoured, by Remy. Oh, this was his best recipe ever! He HAD to make more!

The hours went by quickly...

By sundown, Remy was still eating, somewhere around cake #25, and it showed. His rodent body was now the shape of, well, Remy's corpulent brother, Emile, and then some. His belly stuck out, bloated, jiggling, and sagging, slightly obstructing his view of objects on the floor, like his feet. His behind had slowly begun to swallow his tail, which even had a bit of adipose on it. His limbs were bloated, and he wasn't able to move them as easily as he used to, earlier in the morning. He weighted about four pounds easily, where as most rats weighed one. Though, besides resembling a furry bowling ball, Remy didn’t seem to mind…as long as the fat on his body didn’t stop him from preparing the cakes and getting them from the oven. As he continued his feeding frenzy, Remy felt his eye begin to droop….that was a good sign, he had watched, and, if his food was particularly good, the patrons of Le Ratatouille always seemed to seem drowsy after eating. Well…maybe he’d better finish off the cakes…but….wow, he was tired, soon, his eyes closed…and he forgot that he was in the middle of his greatest meal…

When Remy woke up, he found...
1221.title: Sleep-Eating?

choices: Emile walks in, seeing his larger figure
12211.content: When Remy woke up the next day,he coudn't beleive what had happend. The cakes he had made were gone. He had tiny crumbs on his lips and his belly went out a little. He soon realised that he somehow ate the rest of the cakes in his sleep. Just when he was wondering how that happend,
12211.title: He had eaten in his sleep

choices: Both are equally fat, and tie.
123.content:
Emile spied on his brother in the kitchen. Remy had been in there for hours now, cooking nonstop for some sort of party. Emile could smell it through the open door; in fact their whole place smelled like Remy’s delicious cooking, and Emile was starving, practically drooling as he saw the savory snacks Remy had been preparing; pies, cakes, steaks, and other food that smelled, and looked, so delicious.

Remy was too busy checking on his stove to notice his fatter brother sneak over, grabbing a particularly delicious-looking pie, until he turned around, seeing his brother’s face buried in it. Emile looked up, blueberry matted in his fur, and smiled sheepishly at the disapproving look Remy was giving him. “Emile, that’s not for you.” He chided as his brother swallowed.

“H-Hey, I just…. Thought you might need a taste-tester?” Emile nervously offered as an excuse as Remy sighed, pinching his brow, “Look, a ‘taste-tester’ doesn’t eat the whole thing,” He said, “Besides, I already know my cooking is good.” Emile nodded and resumed eating, “You can say that again.” He said, mouth full of pie filling, as Remy grunted and snatched it away. “Hey!” he yelled, as Emile shyly backed away.

“Aw, come one!” Emile groaned, exasperated, “Why are you making all this if I can’t even have a nibble? Besides it’s not like you can eat all of it.” Remy shook his head, “Because a nibble is only a little bit. You eat…. More than that. Also, I could so eat all of this myself, but I need to prepare something for the local fair.” Emile grumbled, “That’s in 4 DAYS Remy. You can stand to lose a couple of goodies in the meantime.” Remy rolled his eyes, “Always pays to be prepared.”

“Come on, who’s gonna eat all this if you aren’t?” Emile added, snatching the pie away, “Hey, I could totally eat all this myself, you know?” Emile scoffed, “Yeah, right” he said, “I think it’s obvious who the bigger rat here is.” He patted his big belly, before burying his snout in the pie. Remy grumbled, “Okay, you wanna bet?” He grabbed a pie himself, and began tearing into it suddenly, sending filling and crumbs everywhere. Within moments, the plate was clean, Remy had gunk across his snout, and finished with a large “BWOOOOORP”, which Emilie giggled at, “Nice”, he complimented him, “But check out this.” Emile jammed his face in his own pie, gobbling it down in seconds, leaving as much of a mess as Remy did until the tin was empty, looked up, and let out a large belch right in his brother’s face, knocking him back a bit. “BUUUUURRRRRRRAAAAPPP!”

Remy waved a paw in front of his muzzle, chuckling a bit himself, “Alright, alright…. You know what?” He said, turning off his stove and walking towards the pantry, “Follow me.” Emile raised an eyebrow in interest and did as he was told, the two brothers bounding down into the basement as Remy pulled a cord from the ceiling, illuminating the store room. Emile’s eyes widened. It was full of food. “I have a bit saved up here. ‘Rations’ you might say.” He laughed, “Wanna help me polish these off? The one who eats the most wins..” Emile licked his lips, stomach growling, “Sure…. Just don’t be too disappointed when I win.” Remy chuckled, “In your dreams.” He said, as both brothers bounding in and started to eat.

They stuffed themselves with whatever they could find, bread, cheese, crackers, any of Remy’s extras they could get. As they did, their bellies began swelling, slowly, as they packed on the pounds, filling up, rounding with full, jiggly flab. Their hips got wider, bellies bigger and fuller, arms pudgier. All the while, a chorus of burps resounded as the brothers stopped to release their gas every so often. Their fur was coated in crumbs and slobber as they ate.

Remy had developed a nice double chin and moobs, as well as a decently sized gut that protruded. Soon, he was starting to look more and more like his brother, who himself was starting to look more and more like a pig as he ate. They were in fierce competition as their bellies continued to balloon, their fat swaying, and jiggling with each thunderous burp and occasional fart from Emile, which Remy regarded with disgust. Though eventually, he could feel his own gas getting worse the more he ate, and was also beginning to rip ass too, Emile chuckling as he saw his ‘uptight’ brother letting loose, as Remy tried not to look at him, or smile from the feeling of release.

Soon after, the food in the cellar had been depleted, leaving a few crumbs left on a shelf that Remy and Emile finally met on. “It’s-URRRP-mine!”, “I-UBWOOORP-GOT IT, I GOT IT!” they yelled at one another, fighting over the scraps, until they finally managed to gobble them up, and reclined, letting out blasts of stinking gas. Remy’s gut was hurting so much; he didn’t think he cared about how gross or embarrassing it was. He definitely knew Emile probably didn’t, given how shamelessly he was belching and farting. They were starting to seriously stink.

Finally, after a few minutes of catching their breaths, the brothers turned to look at each other and see who won….
123.title: Fattest One Wins

info.brief_description: Bloat n'swell the characters from Pixar's Ratatouille.
info.description: Fatten or inflate the characters from Ratatouille! Feel free to explore what would happen if Remy used poor Emile as a test subject for every one of his food dishes...or made blueberry muffins that turned Emile INTO a blueberry! Use your imagination, don't feel restricted in any form. Have fun!
